Kentucky is where bourbon meets bluegrass, where automotive plants produce world-class vehicles, and where the Kentucky Derby draws global attention. Vouch Mobile helps Kentuckians stay connected from Louisville to Lexington at a price as smooth as the state's famous whiskey.

Network

AT&T Coverage in Kentucky

Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's award-winning network, providing Kentucky residents with reliable 5G and LTE coverage across the Bluegrass State. With 99% population coverage, you'll stay connected wherever you go.

According to the FCC Broadband Map, AT&T provides extensive wireless coverage throughout Kentucky, including urban centers and many rural areas.

Benefits

Why Kentucky Residents Choose Vouch

Kentucky's average phone bill of $102/month adds up for working families—Vouch cuts that by 71%.

Whether you're working at a Toyota plant, visiting bourbon country, or cheering on the Wildcats, you need reliable coverage.

No credit check means UK and U of L students, new residents, and hourly workers can sign up instantly.

AT&T's network covers Kentucky from the Ohio River to the Appalachian foothills, with strong coverage along I-64 and I-65.

    FAQ

    Kentucky Coverage Questions

    Everything you need to know about Vouch Mobile in Kentucky

    Yes! Vouch Mobile provides 99% population coverage across Kentucky using AT&T's network. From Louisville to Lexington, Bowling Green to Covington, you'll have reliable 5G and LTE service throughout the Bluegrass State.

    Vouch Mobile operates on AT&T's network in Kentucky. AT&T provides coverage in major metros, along interstate corridors, and in most communities throughout the state.

    Vouch Mobile costs $30/month for unlimited talk, text, and data—no matter where you live in Kentucky. The average Kentuckian pays $102/month for phone service, so you could save over $864 per year by switching to Vouch.

    No credit check required. Whether you're a UK student, a new Louisville resident, or rebuilding your credit, you can sign up for Vouch Mobile instantly.

    Switching is easy: check that your phone is unlocked, order a free Vouch SIM card shipped to your Kentucky address, then activate online in minutes. You can keep your existing phone number—we'll handle the port.

    Yes! 5G is available in Louisville, Lexington, Bowling Green, and other Kentucky cities. Your 5G access is included free with your $30/month plan.

    Yes. AT&T's network provides coverage at Churchill Downs and throughout Louisville, even during Derby week.

    AT&T's network covers populated areas throughout Eastern Kentucky, though mountainous terrain may affect coverage in some remote locations.
